game_description: It is DEMO version of a game. Break any objects using weapons and other picked up objects. Any weapon in the game can be equipped. You can use both hands to crush everything around. Try throwing a fire extinguisher, it's a very dangerous weapon. You can also throw any weapons and objects that you can pick up. For demolish different objects, in different ways, a different number of points is awarded. Try to score more points to take the top line in the leaderboard. You have 60 seconds to do this.
review_1: This was amazing I would love to see the full game and it has cured my depression and sadness thank you for this and please respond to me if you can at any time or cause I love you this game is amazing and thanks for making it free to play by the way this game was amazing it was way too bad I'm playing my Oculus on charger
review_4: Excellent gaming experience. It's fun to demolish everything around:)
